page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: In winter time I watch television in the drawing room and Mummy lights a wood fire. Childrens programmes range from cartoons to cowboy and Indian films. I have supper at 7.30pm and then I have a bath and clean my teeth. Mummy then reads me a story before we say our prayers and go to sleep. In the holidays I get up much later and I go out into the yard and throw the 16 bantam chickens three scoopfulls of corn. I collect their eggs from the hay boxes and when I have had my breakfast I feed the dogs. We have three dogs who live inside the house and one outside guard dog. We also feed the three cats. During the day I ride my bike around the garden and the farm track. We have a swimming pool and when it is hot we splash around in it a lot!
